name: Maria Shriver
relations: '''Parents''': Sargent Shriver and Eunice Kennedy Shriver, '''Siblings''': Anthony Shriver, Bobby Shriver, Mark Shriver, Timothy Shriver , '''Grandparents''': Rose Kennedy and Joseph P.
